text: Russell Lewis is a British television writer. Russell Lewis may also refer to: * Russell A. Lewis (1895–1966), American college football coach * Russell Lewis (chairman), former chairman of the Bow Group * Russell Lewis (choreographer), dance director nominated for Academy Award for Best Dance Direction * Russell Lewis (footballer) (born 1956), Welsh footballer * Russell T. Lewis (born 1947), CEO of the New York Times Company
title: Russell Lewis (disambiguation)
